C

changelevel() - Method in class lawnlayer.App
The level Index is increased and checks if there are more levels.
changeTile - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
Checks if the enemy touched the tral
changetilefromgreentored() - Method in class lawnlayer.App
The function changes the green trail tiles in the map to red from where the enemy touched it
changeTileIndex - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
Which index to start changing the greentrail from
changingMapforFill() - Method in class lawnlayer.App
This function is used for the floodfill The map is cloned and flood filled the regions from the nemies positions with a placeholder The null position in the map is filled and the placeholder is replaced with null (empty space)
clearPath - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
Checks if we should change the greentrail into grass
clearPathDead - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
Checks if we need to remove the greentrail as the player died
Collide(String[][]) - Method in class lawnlayer.Enemies
It checks if the enemy is colliding with any components of the map It returns the coordinates of the object with which it is colliding
completed - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
The percentage area covered by the grass
concrete - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
 
configPath - Variable in class lawnlayer.App
 

D

dead() - Method in class lawnlayer.App
This function decreases the lives of the player and resets the ball position

The dfs fucntion which fill all regions in all four directions from the given input

map - Static variable in class lawnlayer.App
The map is stored in this 2-d array
mapDraw() - Method in class lawnlayer.App
The map elements such as grass, concrete, green trail, red trail and powerups are drawn here on the window “X” = concrete “O” = Green Trail “R” = Red Trail “G” = Grass “P1” = Power Up 1 “P2” = Power Up 2
mapNew - Static variable in class lawnlayer.App
A new map just for the flood fill
